Posts.Content: Nov 27, 2018 10:31AM Clynnejohn505 wrote: I saw that Minus Two has breast lymphedema. Anyone else? I have this and it seems to be rare in comparison to arm lymphedema. I could use advice on what works!
Posts.Title: Kicking LE's butt!! Exercise & Self Care Log Tina337 Flynn

Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2018 07:26AM Clynnejohn505 wrote: Hi everyone! Just wanted to update on my breast lymphedema. I got a swell spot and I wear it at night. It has made such a difference! On occasion I will also use the 'chuck' (a net like thing full of cushy material) in my bra or under by straps in the back. Definitely helps because I can feel my ribs much easier now! I also have a special bra on order but with the holiday I haven't been able to pick it up. I will update how that goes in the New Year. Happy New Year everyone!
Posts.Title: Kicking LE's butt!! Exercise & Self Care Log Tina337 Flynn

Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2018 05:21AM Clynnejohn505 wrote: Hi everyone! Stomach issues finally easing up. Seems to be major constipation. My doctor said it’s another form of the peripheral neuropathy. Ugh. Like JenRuns said chemo is the gift that keeps giving!
